SENT.plain: Burkitt's lymphoma is an aggressive form of Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma composed of malignant cells of B lymphocyte origin
Burkitt's lymphoma is a rarity in the Indian subcontinent
Though intraoral Burkitt's lymphoma in HIV positive individuals is very uncommon, its importance lies in the fact that it is often the first sign of the underlying immunosuppression
We present a case of Burkitt's lymphoma in right maxillary region which was the first manifestation of HIV in the patient
